## Context.Convert.validatedContextDecl variable

Converter which constructs a [validated context declaration](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextdecl.md) from a [context declaration](./ts-res.context.icontextdecl.md)<!-- -->, instantiating qualifiers by name from a supplied [conversion context](./ts-res.context.convert.icontextdeclconvertcontext.md)<!-- -->.
